attributes.action: disband the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the basis that it should not require an annual expenditure of over six million pounds and eighty staff (including for example a Director of Communications aided by a communications manager and an assistant communications manager) to set out guidelines and administer the expenses of just 646 people, the IPSA should be disbanded immediately and replaced with a modest expenses office administering MP expenses to HMRC expenses guidelines.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
